definition: to detain/to hold back by force/to buckle/to hook

to fasten/to button/button/buckle/knot/to arrest/to confiscate/to deduct (money)/discount/to knock/to smash, spike or dunk (a ball)/to cover (with a bowl etc)/(fig.) to tag a label on sb/(Tw) (loanword) code
to live/to dwell/to stay/to reside/to stop/(suffix indicating firmness, steadiness, or coming to a halt)

sentences.english: Their long claws allow them to fasten onto the rocks and hold firm.
sentences.chinese: 它們的長爪子使它們能夠扣住岩石並緊緊抓住。

sentences.english: On a three-button jacket, you button the middle; the top button is optional.
sentences.chinese: 三個釦子的外套，你扣住中間的，頂上的隨意。

sentences.english: This skirt hooks on the side.
sentences.chinese: 這件裙子在側面有鉤扣住。

sentences.english: Horizontal intermediate cross rails, which are required for locks, will be recessed and concealed.
sentences.chinese: 水平過渡交叉擋板應扣住，凹入並隱藏。

sentences.english: Don't initiate a personal discussion；stick to questions about her career path.
sentences.chinese: 不要談論個人問題，應扣住她的事業提問。

sentences.english: She caught the insect by inverting her cup over it.
sentences.chinese: 她用杯子扣住了那隻昆蟲。

sentences.english: She put a white gown on me and pinned it at the neck in back with a safety pin.
sentences.chinese: 她給我披上一件白袍子，脖子後邊用個釦針扣住。

sentences.english: The nurses wore masks and close-fitting white caps.
sentences.chinese: 護士們戴着口罩和緊緊扣住頭髮的白帽子。

sentences.english: They held onto it, I would say very wrongly, for a year.
sentences.chinese: 他們扣住消息長達一年，我想說這樣做不道德。
那件外衣從上到下都是用鈕釦扣住的。

sentences.english: A hold-up in diamonds won't help you now.
sentences.chinese: 在方塊上的扣住打法現在不起作用了。

sentences.english: The nurses wore masks and close-fitting white caps.
sentences.chinese: 口罩和緊緊扣住頭髮的白帽子。

sentences.english: Never pose questions that a library search could have answered.
sentences.chinese: 不要談論個人問題，應扣住她的事業提問。

sentences.english: Sweet music caught and held him transfixed against the iron fence.
sentences.chinese: 甜美的音樂穿過了鐵牆而緊緊地扣住他的心絃。

sentences.english: She bailed a cow up for milking.
sentences.chinese: 她用閘架扣住奶牛頭部以便擠奶。

sentences.english: They seized on the ship and imprisoned the crew.
sentences.chinese: 他們扣住了船並拘留了全體船員。

definition: to catch/to grapple with/to hold onto
the five fingers of one's hand
with all one's might/with sudden force/violently/to slam
to release/to let go/to loosen/to untie/to come loose
to fasten tightly with a hoop
